        public CloneChannelCommand(boolean originalStateIn,

        Constructor

        originalStateIn - true to clone with no errata, false to clone with all errata

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public Channel create()
               throws InvalidChannelLabelException,
                      InvalidChannelNameException,
                      InvalidParentChannelException
        Clones Channel based on the parameters that were set.
        Overrides:
        create in class CreateChannelCommand
        Returns:
        the newly cloned Channel
        Throws:
        InvalidChannelLabelException - thrown if label is in use or invalid.
        InvalidChannelNameException - throw if name is in use or invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if label, name or user are null.
        InvalidParentChannelException - thrown if parent label is not a valid base channel.
